name: Risk
lyrics: I've got a video, it’s all the proof I need. A man falls twenty stories and bounces up ten feet. Now I know not to risk what I already have. I don't care what I miss as long as I don't fall. I’ve got just one more step before I cross the line, but I've seen what happens. I step back instead

name: Autobiography
lyrics: Things are not slowing down and I can't get off. It's not getting any easier - the lie has not withstood. 100 miles too fast, my role has changed one thousand times - turn the pages slower! The table of contents is getting longer and I find the pages harder to turn

name: Other Stars
lyrics:
'You're not like the other stars - I can tell by the way you touch the dark.'

'Stop it', I said, 'I don't deserve this!:

'I collect the dark inside of me while others try not to push it away - it's easier that way.'

'Misunderstand me - mistake my vices for virtues. Misunderstand me - the only way you'll ever respect me. I am a star, but I don't shine.'

name: Tearjerker
lyrics: It would seem easy to go back to a life I once knew, but I can't remember a tear or two won't solve my problems. I'm sitting here, bloods in my eyes

name: Elevator Action
lyrics:
This is my, my last chance
My mouth fails to move
To the signs I've heard before, before

'Nothing,' I said frightened
'Help me,' I said frightened
'Nothing,' I said

And now I'm longing for the choice
The choice that I once had
It's up and gone away, away

'Nothing,' I said frightened
'Help me,' I said frightened
'Nothing,' I said

'Nothing,' I said
'Nothing,' I said
'Nothing,' I blew it
'Nothing,' I said
translation:
Strictly Ballroom – Elevator Action (Эффект лифта)

Это мой п

дний шанс, мне не удается выговорить слова, которые я слышал раньше. 'Ничего', - сказал я, напуганный. А теперь я тоскую по той возможности, которая когда-то у меня была. 'Ничего', - сказал я. Я все упустил.
